column5: Went up north with my son.  He finally got his boater card and he had fun driving the boat.  I thought he’d set a speed record when he was by himself but I see my max speed is still tops.  	He caught a few nice fish.
Tried the air fryer that wasn’t as good as pan fry.
Whenever I have a chance I cook fish on a fire.
Glen good to hear you got out and enjoyed yourself after being sick. Spending time with your son .... priceless
Ya it was good to get away. Very relaxing.   	I hope everyone gets out and finds some happiness.
